anthropic_config.system: Hyper-realistic 3D square diorama of Istanbul, carved out with exposed soil cross-section beneath showing rocks, roots, and earth layers. Above: whimsical fairytale cityscape featuring iconic landmarks, architecture, and cultural elements of Istanbul. Modern white “Istanbul” label integrated naturally. Pure white studio background with soft natural lighting. DSLR photograph quality - crisp, vibrant, magical realism style. 1080x1080 dimensions

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""Hyper-realistic 3D square diorama of Istanbul, carved out with exposed soil cross-section beneath sh...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
